document.full_text: samsung electronics faces a challenging outlook after reporting its third consecutive fall in quarterly profit as it struggles to make ground on apple inc and deal with a tepid recovery in its tv and flat screens business.
document.title: samsung sees tough outlook, q1 hits 2-yr low on tvs
lines_and_colors: samsung electronics faces a challenging outlook after reporting its third consecutive fall in quarterly profit as it struggles to make ground on apple inc and deal with a tepid recovery in its tv and flat screens business.
